That’s a straight-up 43% markdown and $56 less than its full price, which the Frost White variant is currently fetching directly at Apple’s online store at the moment. While the standard black and white M75 models have dipped lower in the past, these Mac-compatible versions in the special finishes haven’t seen a cut this deep. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this gaming mouse, and you’ll find more details below if you need to know more about it before jumping in.

items.title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters ahead of new version

items.title: Kyrgyzstan sees nearly 21 million foreign entries in 2025

items.title: These Worx sawhorses hold up to 1,000 pounds, come with bar clamps, storage shelves, and a triangular ruler at $70
items.summary:
Worx Clamping Sawhorses

Buy for $70 (Reg. $95)

What we love

These Worx sawhorses will fit right in with your other tools in garages, shops, and even other spaces like art or crafting studios, and more. They each weigh only four pounds, and come with integrated (and removable) bar clamps to fasten big and small projects alike in vertical or horizontal positions – with up to 300 pounds of pressure from each. What’s more, they can support up to 1,000 pounds, feature storage shelves at the bottom of their legs, and come with a 7-inch metal triangle ruler.

items.title: Lectric offers extremely rare price cuts on all e-bikes with some bundled FREE gear for few days – starting from $799 lows
items.summary:
Lectric has launched an unexpected weekend price cut flash sale that is striking $100 off most of its e-bikes, except the premium ONE e-bike with a $500 price cut, as well as some smaller bundle packages up to $220 in size across some series. Things are starting the lowest with the XP Lite2 JW Black Belt-Drive e-bike at $799 shipped, while you’ll have to go with its long-range chain-drive or belt-drive counterparts to also snag some FREE bundled gear. This standard model hardly ever comes with additional FREE gear like the longer-range models, but that lack of extra equipment is offset by the extremely rare $100 discount here that is a first in over a year, marking a new low price as far as we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it, its long-range upgrades, and to browse the full lineup of deals while they last over the next few days.

items.title: How to upgrade to Animal Crossing Switch 2 Edition down at $52, more
items.summary:
If you are, for some reason, one of the only folks out there with a Switch 2 that doesn’t have a copy of Animal Crossing: New Horizons, you might want to consider this deal. Nintendo just recently released the Switch 2 Edition alongside some additional content for the game, but the Switch 2 Edition will run you $65. That’s almost certainly worth it, but you could also scoop up the Switch 1 edition on sale for $44.99 Prime shipped at Woot and then grab the $6.99 upgrade pack from Nintendo to land the same package for $52. Chances are it’s going to be a long while before we see the proper Switch 2 edition down at a price like that. “Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition features enhanced resolution, mouse control support for faster and easier decorating, a megaphone for calling your animal residents that uses the system microphone, and more.”
